name: LD50: Inevitable Orbit
description:
Inevitable Orbit is a simple game made for the Ludum Dare 50

Take control of a satellite orbiting the planet Decayo. Use your thrusters and deploy additional fuel tanks to maintain orbit. However, no matter how hard you try to delay the inevitable you will eventually fall from orbit.

How long will you last?

Controls:

X: Majority of selects and fire thrusters

Z on keyboard/O looking button: Deploy fuel tank for pickup.

Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Created for LD50 Compo April 2022
